description: This file configures ESLint for a Next.js project, setting up compatibility with specific ESLint configurations and extending base configurations for core web vitals and TypeScript.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Stores the current file path using URL to Path conversion.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Stores the directory name of the current file.

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Creates a FlatCompat instance for extending ESLint configurations.
